text: My best friend pushed me into the lake.
keypoint: My best friend pushed me into the lake

text: This happened during our annual summer camping trip and we were enjoying a peaceful afternoon.
keypoint: We were on our annual summer camping trip

text: The reason it all began, she spotted a frog near the water's edge or - this was at our favorite spot in the woods - and she dared me to catch it.
keypoint: She spotted a frog and dared me to catch it

text: I had just sat down to eat my sandwich and I told her I wasn't interested. 'Course friends, y'know, they don't always take no for an answer.
keypoint: I tried to eat my sandwich and refused her dare

text: So that's when she snuck up behind me and gave me a little nudge.
keypoint: She snuck up and nudged me into the lake

text: When I emerged from the water, there was a frog on the shore, she just scooped it up and handed it to me. And . . .; I couldn't help but laugh â€“ uncontrollably.
keypoint: She caught the frog and I laughed uncontrollably

text: And naturally, the first thing to do was to get revenge, and I said, "Just you wait," I said, "you'll get yours soon enough."
keypoint: I vowed to get my revenge on her
